events.message: I recently bought a pair of shoes from your store, but they do not fit at all. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer reported an issue requesting a refund due to incorrect size and fit of the purchased shoes.
Assigning the refund request case to the refund specialist team for further handling.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for the refund so that we can process it quickly?
The order number is 123456789. The shoes are too tight and uncomfortable, and I want my money back.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately once we receive the returned shoes at our warehouse.
Thanks for your prompt response. I will send the shoes back today and expect the refund soon.
Your returned shoes have been received and your refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount back in your account shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund issue has been resolved, we are closing this case. Have a great day!
